OrgName.entry: WORLD METAL INDEX - INFORMATION FOR SMALL BUSINESS

AltName.entry: MI-21 METALS INFORMATION FOR THE TWENTY FIRST CENTURY

Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information Services. The World Metal Index (WMI) is the key to a unique collection of standards and specifications, trade literature and technical journals on both ferrous and non-ferrous metal. Over 200,000 individual metal grades are included, both current and historical. MI-21 (Metals Information for the 21st Century), a collaboration that brings together the expertise and knowledge bases of the WMI and the Welding Institute (TWI), provides a useful resource for information on metallic materials and welding consumables. 24/7 access to search the currently available 20,000 MI-21 World Index datasheets online by subscription at www.mi-21.com

ContactName.entry: Jean Morton/Susanne Knight, Information Services Officers
